Top

[Kirkland Tops 2025 M&A/PE League Tables ---------------------------------------](https://kirkland.com/marquee-stories/award/kirkland-tops-2025-ma-league-tables)[Featured Practice Trusted GP Solutions for Strategic Transactions -----------------------------------------------](https://kirkland.com/marquee-stories/transactional/investment-funds/trusted-gp-solutions-for-strategic-transactions)[Featured Practice Developing Solutions for Complex Real Estate Matters ---------------------------------------------------- October 2025](https://kirkland.com/marquee-stories/transactional/real-estate/developing-solutions-for-complex-real-estate-matters)

 More News 

Our experience, visibility into the market and innovative approach to complex matters have earned us the top spot in several categories across the full-year 2025 M&A and private equity league tables. London Stock Exchange Group ranked us #1 for global M&A by value, while Bloomberg ranked us #1 for global PE deals by value. Mergermarket ranked us #1 for both global M&A and global buyouts, noting: “Kirkland & Ellis broke past all past records with $1 trillion in deal value under its belt — setting a gold standard for legal deal volumes.” We also led several categories for 2025 deal activity across U.S. and European markets.

 Learn more about our leading [transactional](https://kirkland.com/services/practices/transactional)practices.
